episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: 9-year-old Sheldon Cooper is a once-in-a-generation mind capable of advanced mathematics and science but learns that isnâ€™t always helpful growing up in East Texas, a land where church and football are king.

episodes.name: Rockets, Communists, and the Dewey Decimal System
episodes.overview: To appease his worried mother, Sheldon employs the techniques of a self-help book to try and make a friend.

episodes.name: Poker, Faith, and Eggs
episodes.overview: When George Sr. is rushed to the emergency room, Connie comes to babysit, and the kids have an adventure getting to the hospital on their own.

episodes.name: A Therapist, a Comic Book, and a Breakfast Sausage
episodes.overview: After choking on a breakfast sausage, Sheldon wrestles with his fear of solid foods and discovers comic books for the first time.

episodes.name: A Solar Calculator, a Game Ball, and a Cheerleader's Bosom
episodes.overview: Sheldon struggles with newfound popularity after utilizing statistics to help the football team.

episodes.name: A Patch, a Modem, and a Zantac
episodes.overview: When a NASA representative visits Sheldonâ€™s school and dismisses his science, Sheldon is set on a mission to prove him wrong.

episodes.name: A Brisket, Voodoo, and Cannonball Run
episodes.overview: The kids brainstorm ways to resolve a family feud when Connie refuses to give George Sr. her brisket recipe.

episodes.name: Cape Canaveral, SchrÃ¶dinger's Cat and Cyndi Lauper's Hair
episodes.overview: While Mary, Connie and Missy have their girls night at the salon, the three Cooper men plan their road trip to see the space launcher, but it doesn't go as well as they plan.

episodes.name: Spock, Kirk, and Testicular Hernia
episodes.overview: George Sr. strikes a deal with Sheldon to tutor Georgie when poor grades threaten to keep him from playing football

episodes.name: An Eagle Feather, A String Bean, And An Eskimo
episodes.overview: When Sheldon moves to Dallas to attend a school for gifted children, the family struggles to cope with his absence.

episodes.name: Demons, Sunday School, and Prime Numbers
episodes.overview: A worried Mary sends Sheldon to Sunday school after she finds him playing Dungeons and Dragons with his friends, Tam and Billy.

episodes.name: A Computer, a Plastic Pony, and a Case of Beer
episodes.overview: Sheldon asks for a computer and unknowingly sparks a heated argument between Mary and George Sr. over the familyâ€™s finances.

episodes.name: A Sneeze, Detention, and Sissy Spacek
episodes.overview: When flu season hits Medford, Sheldon takes extreme measures to remain healthy.

episodes.name: Potato Salad, a Broomstick, and Dad's Whiskey
episodes.overview: When Mary takes a job as church secretary, she finds herself becoming Pastor Jeff's marriage counselor. Also, Sheldon and Missy spend their first afternoon home alone.

episodes.name: Dolomite, Apple Slices, and a Mystery Woman
episodes.overview: Sheldon makes friends with an upperclassman who introduces him to a new field of science. Also, Mary and George disagree on how to handle Sheldon's blossoming social life.

episodes.name: Killer Asteroids, Oklahoma, and a Frizzy Hair Machine
episodes.overview: A disappointing loss at the science fair sends Sheldonâ€™s life in a new direction.

episodes.name: Jiu-Jitsu, Bubble Wrap, and Yoo-hoo
episodes.overview: Sheldon is bullied by an unlikely character, and Mary and George disagree on how to handle the situation.

episodes.name: A Mother, A Child, and a Blue Man's Backside
episodes.overview: Mary bans Sheldon from reading a mature comic book. Sheldon decides it's time to stop living under Mary's thumb.

episodes.name: Gluons, Guacamole, and the Color Purple
episodes.overview: When Sheldon is no longer academically challenged at Medford High, he audits a college class taught by Dr. John Sturgis.

episodes.name: A Dog, a Squirrel, and a Fish Named Fish
episodes.overview: A battle erupts between the Coopers and Sparks when the Sparks' new dog terrorizes Sheldon.

episodes.name: Summer Sausage, a Pocket Poncho, and Tony Danza
episodes.overview: While Sheldon is busy keeping tabs on Connieâ€™s budding relationship with Dr. Sturgis, George Sr. and Mary attempt to bond with their other children.

episodes.name: Vanilla Ice Cream, Gentleman Callers, and A Dinette Set
episodes.overview: When Connie is pursued by two gentlemen callers, Sheldon interferes, forcing her to set some ground rules.
